vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μάρθα, -ας (Bl., § 7, 2), ἡ (Aram. מָרְתָּא),
Martha: Luk.10:38, 40-41, Jhn.11:1, 5 11:19 ff. Luk.12:2.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.10.38;
sister of: Mary (G3137J) and Lazarus (G2976H)
§ Martha, "lady [female lord]"
Martha, (Proper name), Jn. 12:2
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
馬大
1) 拉撒路和伯大尼馬利亞的姊妹
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
马大
1) 拉撒路和伯大尼马利亚的姊妹
